contentrichtext.text: '''John Morris''' may refer to: * [[John Morris (piper)]] (fl. 1870's), Irish piper *[[John Morris (actor)]] (born 1984), of the Toy Story films *[[John Morris (Australian politician)]] (born 1936), Australian Senator *[[John Morris (composer)]] (born 1926), film composer often employed by Mel Brooks *[[John Morris (geologist)]] (1810–1886), geologist *[[John Morris (historian)]] (1913–1977), English historian *[[John Morris (pirate)]], English buccaneer *[[John D. Morris]] (born 1946), Christian creationist *[[John W. Morris]] (born 1921), U.S. Army general *[[John Morris, Baron Morris of Borth-y-Gest]] (1896–1979), British law lord *[[John Morris, Baron Morris of Aberavon]] (born 1931), British politician, former Attorney-General *[[Sir John Morris, 1st Baronet]] (1745–1819), Welsh industrialist *[[John Patrick Morris]] (1894–1962), British Member of Parliament for [[Salford North (UK Parliament constituency)|Salford North]], 1931–1945 *[[John Morris (Jesuit)]] (1826–1893), English Jesuit and historical writer *[[John Morris (Medal of Honor)]] (born 1855), United States Marine Corps corporal who received the Medal of Honor *[[John Albert Morris]] (1836–1895), American businessman *[[John Baptist Morris]] (1866–1946), American prelate of the Roman Catholic Church *[[John McLean Morris]] (1911–1993), American gynecologist *[[John Meirion Morris]] (born 1936), Welsh sculptor *[[John Hughes Morris]] (1870–1953), English Presbyterian minister, editors and writer *[[John Brande Morris]] (1812–1886), English Anglican theologian, later a Roman Catholic priest *[[John G. Morris]] (born 1916), picture editor == Sport == *[[John Morris (cricketer)]] (born 1964), English cricketer *[[John Morris (curler)]] (born 1978), Canadian curler *[[John Morris (outfielder)]] (born 1961), baseball player, played 1986–1992 *[[John Morris (pitcher)]] (born 1941), professional baseball pitcher *[[John Morris (rugby league)]] (born 1980), Australian rugby league player *[[Jack Morris]] (born 1955), baseball pitcher (born John Morris) *[[John Morris (racing driver)]] (born 1944), British auto racing driver *[[John Morris (New Zealand footballer)]] (born 1950), New Zealand international footballer *[[John Morris (Welsh footballer)]] (1873–1914), Chirk F.C. and Wales international footballer *[[John Morris (bowls)]], former lawn bowls competitor for New Zealand *[[John Morris (tennis coach)]] (born 1982), British born tennis coach == Others == *Former [[List of Burgesses of Erie, Pennsylvania|Burgess of Erie, Pennsylvania]], 1822–1824 *The owner of [[Bass Pro Shops]] *Fictional character in the video game series [[List of characters in the Castlevania series#Bloodlines and Portrait of Ruin|Castlevania]] ==See also== *[[Johnny Morris (disambiguation)]] *[[John Maurice, Prince of Nassau-Siegen]] (1604–1679), count and (from 1674) prince of Nassau-Siegen *[[John Morice (disambiguation)]] *[[Jonathan Morris (disambiguation)]] {{hndis|Morris, John}}
